TopicTitle: Last Generation Technologies- Flying boat mod (First Mod)

Articles.Content:
The goal this company is bring back old tech. Here's some of my models:

Update: I've taken the advice of Cpt. Kipard and spent more time on the model(because the previous ones took 20 mins compared to 1.5-2 hours).

Here ye go: http://imgur.com/a/Reaw2#3

I think this shows the extent of my basic ability, other "mod worthy" models will be released soon.

ps: how do you post pics like other posts

Edited January 14, 2015 by Izzy4252
Are you making a set of reusable parts or are you making parts that just fit with eachother, like the mini shuttle.

I'm making modular plane parts similar to the Canadair CL-215 and PBY Catalina

Edit: Yes like a shuttle

Edited January 11, 2015 by Izzy4252
Have you considered participating in the Open Source Part Dare? it would be a great way for you to develop and polish some modding skills to help you with your larger project.
Yeah you should start there, get some practice, expose yourself to criticism (otherwise you wont learn as quickly) and then get back to this.

I'm making modular plane parts similar to the Canadair CL-215 and PBY Catalina

Keen as mustard

Water takeoff / landing is sorely neglected in KSP & now that we have BetterBuoyancy... The time has come
